thread.title_full: Gerhard's Appliance Inc. reviewed by Ben

author: Ben
title: Ben
text:
We are very happy with all of our interactions with Gerhard's sales and delivery staff. Lisa, our Sales Rep at the Glenside location, has now helped us on multiple occasions to find the appliance which best suits our needs without having to spend all afternoon in doing so. When purchasing a stove top/range about a month ago, the delivery team was pleasant, professional, and quick during the installation.
We will definitely use Gerhard's Appliances in the future and will not hesitate to recommend to friends and family!
